import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' const HomeComponent = () => { const [like, setLike] = useState(false) const [comment, setComment] = useState(false) const [share, setShare] = useState(false) const likeHandler = () => { setLike(!like) console.log('user liked your post') } const commentHandler = () => { setComment(!comment) console.log('user commented on your post') } return (
{like ? : } {comment ? : }
) } export default HomeComponent
